unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kolkata, cinephiles are flocking to celebrate the magic of movies.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kolkata, cinephiles are flocking to celebrate the magic of movies.

unnormalised: Word on the street is the Dharamshala International Film Festival (DIFF) is gearing up for another stellar year, showcasing indie gems and thought-provoking documentaries. Imagine munching on piping hot samosas while discussing the merits of the latest Iranian neo-realist drama. Heaven, right?
normalised: Word on the street is the Dharamshala International Film Festival (D I F F) is gearing up for another stellar year, showcasing indie gems and thought-provoking documentaries. Imagine munching on piping hot samosas while discussing the merits of the latest Iranian neo-realist drama. Heaven, right?

unnormalised: But before that, all eyes are on the upcoming Kerala International Film Festival (KIFF). It's almost Onam time, and what better way to celebrate than with a cinematic feast?
normalised: But before that, all eyes are on the upcoming Kerala International Film Festival (K I F F). It's almost Onam time, and what better way to celebrate than with a cinematic feast?

unnormalised: Expect a vibrant mix of Indian and international films, workshops, and the usual dose of celebrity spotting. Early bird passes are already selling out faster than hot biryani on Eid, so don't miss out! It's your chance to discover the next big thing in cinema or maybe just get a selfie with your favourite director. So, grab your popcorn and prepare for a cinematic journey! This promises to be a good one.
